dcterms:creator: Aliane Delente
Richard Renault
dcterms:description: A corpus of French poetic and dramatic texts from the early 17th to the early 20th century, including 8900 poems and 75 plays by 56 authors, totaling 540,000 verses. The corpus is stored in a database that includes results from metrical, rhyme, and strophic analysis.
dcterms:title: AnamA tre Corpus
